name: test_auth_proxy_integration
description:
arrange: deploy the Jenkins charm and establish auth_proxy relations.
    act: send a request Jenkins.
    assert: a 200 is returned.

arrange: deploy the Jenkins charm and establish auth_proxy relations.
act: send a request Jenkins.
assert: a 200 is returned.
